item.title: Our Menu
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
Starters

Guacamole Dip

$12 Guacamole dip with avocado, lime, and tomato.

Cheese Garlic Bread

$8 Toasted French bread topped with romano, cheddar

Halloumi breakfast

$15 Boiled egg, avocado, halloumi cheese.

Batter-fried prawns

$11 Cream cheese, softened butter, prawns.

Shrimps Spaghetti

$20 $16 Spaghetti with shrimps, tomatoes, basil and cheese.

Caprese salad

$10 Cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls and basil.

Main Courses

Farfalle pasta with meatballs

$30 $27 Pasta, meatballs, spinach sauce, chickpeas

Grilled Chicken breasts with Vegetables

$35 Chicken breasts, tomato, garlicky sauce of balsamic, mushrooms

Baked camembert

$25 Toasted bread, rosemary, onion marmalade, grilled figs

Roast pork tenderloin

$26 Pork, tenderloin, yogurt

Baked Potato Pizza

$23 Potato, bread, cheese, sausage, mushrooms, tomatoes

Roasted sea bass

$40 Saffron and mussels broth, tomatoes, edamame beans

BEEF BURGER

$10 Grilled beef patties, cheese, lettuce leaf, buns

Chicken teriyaki wings

$10 Chicken wings, barbecue sauce

Deserts

Chocolate cocoa cake

$12 Cocoa powder, butter, cheese, chocolate brownies

Creme brulee

$8 Rich vanilla custard with a caramelised sugar crust

Lemon Meringue Pie

$15 Dark chocolate mousse, candied pecan crunch and caramel

Rice pudding

$13 Rice, milk, sugar, frozen blueberries and raspberries

Apple pie ice cream

$15 Apple slice, cinnamon, milk cream, chocolate

Peanut butter cookies

$11 $7 Peanut, butter, cream

OUR NEWSLETTER

Subscribe to our newsletter and receive 20% discount from your order.

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
We Have Been Serving Our Dishes Since 1984

Zullam nulla eros ultricies sit amet nonummy id imperdiet feugiat peded lectus mollis hendrerit risus nec sem in justo pellentesque facilisis. Etiam imperdiet imperdiet orciunc nec neque leo dolor tempus non auctor hendrerit quis nisi.

Surabitur ligula sapien tincidunt non euismod vitae posuere imperdiet leoae cenas malesuada. Praesent congue erat at massa cursus turpis vitae tortor.

0 MENUS 0 BEVERAGES 0 STAFF MEMBERS 0 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE

36 Years of Experience

Suspendisse potenti Phasellus euismod libero in neque molestie et elementum libero maximus. Etiam in enim vestibulum suscipit sem quis molestie nibh.

Donec ac lacus nec diam gravida pellentesque. Mor biviverrafacilisis massa a ullamcorper eivamus egestas tincidunt faucibus.

OUR NEWSLETTER

Subscribe to our newsletter and receive 20% discount from your order.

item.title: Restaurant About us
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
We Have Been Serving Our Dishes Since 1984

Zullam nulla eros ultricies sit amet nonummy id imperdiet feugiat peded lectus mollis hendrerit risus nec sem in justo pellentesque facilisis. Etiam imperdiet imperdiet orciunc nec neque leo dolor tempus non auctor hendrerit quis nisi.

Surabitur ligula sapien tincidunt non euismod vitae posuere imperdiet leoae cenas malesuada. Praesent congue erat at massa cursus turpis vitae tortor.

0 MENUS 0 BEVERAGES 0 STAFF MEMBERS 0 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE

36 Years of Experience

Suspendisse potenti Phasellus euismod libero in neque molestie et elementum libero maximus. Etiam in enim vestibulum suscipit sem quis molestie nibh.

Donec ac lacus nec diam gravida pellentesque. Mor biviverrafacilisis massa a ullamcorper eivamus egestas tincidunt faucibus.

item.title: Restaurant Our Menu
item.dc:creator: xy440
item.content:encoded:
Starters

Guacamole Dip

$12 Guacamole dip with avocado, lime, and tomato.

Cheese Garlic Bread

$8 Toasted French bread topped with romano, cheddar

Halloumi breakfast

$15 Boiled egg, avocado, halloumi cheese.

Batter-fried prawns

$11 Cream cheese, softened butter, prawns.

Shrimps Spaghetti

$20 $16 Spaghetti with shrimps, tomatoes, basil and cheese.

Caprese salad

$10 Cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls and basil.

Main Courses

Farfalle pasta with meatballs

$30 $27 Pasta, meatballs, spinach sauce, chickpeas

Grilled Chicken breasts with Vegetables

$35 Chicken breasts, tomato, garlicky sauce of balsamic, mushrooms

Baked camembert

$25 Toasted bread, rosemary, onion marmalade, grilled figs

Roast pork tenderloin

$26 Pork, tenderloin, yogurt

Baked Potato Pizza

$23 Potato, bread, cheese, sausage, mushrooms, tomatoes

Roasted sea bass

$40 Saffron and mussels broth, tomatoes, edamame beans

BEEF BURGER

$10 Grilled beef patties, cheese, lettuce leaf, buns

Chicken teriyaki wings

$10 Chicken wings, barbecue sauce

Deserts

Chocolate cocoa cake

$12 Cocoa powder, butter, cheese, chocolate brownies

Creme brulee

$8 Rich vanilla custard with a caramelised sugar crust

Lemon Meringue Pie

$15 Dark chocolate mousse, candied pecan crunch and caramel

Rice pudding

$13 Rice, milk, sugar, frozen blueberries and raspberries

Apple pie ice cream

$15 Apple slice, cinnamon, milk cream, chocolate

Peanut butter cookies

$11 $7 Peanut, butter, cream

Subscribe to our newsletter and receive 20% discount from your order.
